about.me: We are a team of (two) IT professionals with over 15 years of experience, Single pool operators, from Costa Mesa | Bay Area, California, USA. Truly amazed by the vision and mission of Cardano, to change the world. We are happy to be a part of and are working towards helping grow Cardano community.
about.server: Cloud hosted secure servers with Block Producer disconnected from internet, connected via a bastion host, 2 Relays, an airgapped machine for hybrid (online/offline) transaction signing capability and integration with Hardware wallet.
